title: Stress Management Microlearning for Pharmaceutical Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Delivered in a Smartphone-Based Microlearning Environment for Current Practitioners, Providing Pre-Learning Materials (5-Minute Videos or Infographics) via Flipped Learning and Operating Real-Time Online Discussion Sessions

learning_goals: Learners can utilize tools to self-diagnose stress levels during crisis situations such as the COVID-19 pandemic.
Learners can explain the correlation between stress awareness and coping strategies.
Learners can apply three or more ultra-short stress management techniques, accessible in mobile environments, to practical settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
